description.narrative: By end 2021 in the targeted provinces, public and community education structures have the human and material capacity to offer inclusive, quality education services to children, adolescents and young persons, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 5: By the end of 2021, the most vulnerable preschool and school-age children, adolescents and young people, of both sexes, in the 10 targeted provinces make greater use of inclusive, quality educational services, for improved learning outcomes and receive certification for this.

title.narrative: By end 2021 in the targeted provinces, public and community education structures have the human and material capacity to offer inclusive, quality education services to children, adolescents and young persons

description.narrative: UNICEF worked to strengthen the quality of education services through the construction of new school infrastructures, the contracting and training of teachers, and the provision of educational materials for children living in disadvantaged areas, enabling 15,285 out-of-school children to attend school, of whom 42 per cent were girls. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:08/02/2020
